overview:
Daniel OwsiaÅ„ski is an independent IT consultant and author of webankieta.pl - the leading Polish online survey system.

For nearly a decade, he has been engaged in numerous Java projects as a developer, senior developer and finally as an architect. After completing his MBA studies he is also an acting business adviser for IT companies.

Since 2006 Daniel has become a tireless evangelist of Ruby On Rails framework and Ruby itself. He contributes to the Ruby community in Poland. Daniel is well known as one of the founding fathers of Bootstrap.pl, a community of Polish startups, where people can share both their technical and business experience. In his spare time, Daniel is travelling all over Asia with his beloved wife.

relationships.title: Founder and President of the Board
